/* eslint max-len: "off" */

const experience = {
  title: 'Experience',
  icon: null,
  description: null,
  list: [
    {
      title: 'Project Lead',
      subtitle: 'Mphasis Limited',
      date: 'March 2017 - Present',
      subtitleLink: '',
      subtitleDetail: '',
      tags: [
        'aws',
        'azure',
        'kubernetes',
        'microservices',
        'nodejs',
        'ELK',
        'spring',
        'cd/ci',
      ],
      description: [
        'Planned & executed DevOps adoption, JMeter + Grafana API Test Automation',
        'Defined Cloud Architecture & security in Azure & AWS for migration to Cloud',
        'Implemented Voice Assistant for major European Telco',
        'Designed & developed Microservice based applications with Caching',
      ],
    },
    {
      title: 'Senior Solutions Developer',
      subtitle: 'Oracle Limited',
      date: 'November 2015 - February 2017',
      subtitleLink: '',
      subtitleDetail: '',
      tags: [
        'java',
        'spring',
        'low-latency',
        'docker',
        'nodejs',
        'kubernetes',
      ],
      description: [
        'Convert & Extend business requirements to Design documents.',
        'Setup, Implement & Integrate Order Management on Oracle Cloud',
        'Developed Code Accelerators for Telecom Order-to-Cash & Lead-to-Order process in line with eTOM',
        'Developed Solutions on Oracle IoT Cloud for Smart City & Smart Factory',
      ],
    },
    {
      title: 'Senior Software Engineer',
      subtitle: 'Wipro Technologies',
      tags: [
        'java',
        'spring',
        'low-latency',
        'angularjs',
        'nodejs',
      ],
      description: [
        'Did fundamental architectural change to major project by replacing duplicate JSP pages with modular AngularJS & Mocha and flexible observer, decorator, adapter based Java server',
        'Played key role in developing and deploying new critical business product which required me to produce in fast development cycles followed by multiple daily iterations with client Director for feedback and iterate on Java, JavaScript, HTML5 and CSS3 designs',
        'Established new standards on departmental level by developing Java & JavaScript services that I linked to all existing projects as dependency from common Futures repository',
        'Converted all Java/JS codebase to Unix cloud by refactoring to microservice paradigm',
      ],
      subtitleLink: '',
      subtitleDetail: '',
      date: 'September 2015 - September 2016',
    },
  ],
};

export default experience;
